description: At Slider Station our goal is to present a lighter more up-to-date spin on the everyday fast food.  At Slider Station a Slider is not just a burger, it’s the size of the sandwich as well as the desserts.  We hope you will find that our uniquely simple fare is not only a hand full, it’s a mouth full.  At Slider Station we will bring you great food, at a great value in Little Bites, with Big Taste.  Slider Station is the name of our Food Truck.  The truck is the one place where we can bring the flavors and taste of things we love and can offer them to you. Our Chef is ready , the truck is loaded and we will be rounding the bases and sliding to a stop near you.
name: Slider Station
